channel.title: Mystery box help-URGENT
channel.description:
Ok, so mainly my problem is this: I edited the contents of the mystery box in HandeContentItems.java using the code, (bare with me i cant copy and paste from my vps to here so ima try my best to type it out, ima very unexperienced coder trying to work alone with no help unfortunately :( ) ok heres the code i used:
case1: c.getItems().addItem(####, #); break'
and also the code:
case 1: c.getitems().addItem(#### + Misc.random(#), #); break;
Like i said, I started my server about a week ago, I had a developer lined out, but just hasnt been around or tried to do anything, so im left to do everything. Anyway when I edited these codes, and updated server, i now get very random items that i did not put in the boxes, and I have no idea what i did wrong/nor how to fix it. Please add me on skype or mesasge me on here, this is VERY URGENT, any help will be greatly appreciated.
Skype: jacob.Doyle58
Thanks, ~Jacob

item.title: Mystery box help-URGENT
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Okay just make an 2D array

Then use something like this.

int randomNumber = Misc.random(RANDOM_ITEMS.length); c.getItems().addItem(RANDOM_ITEMS[randomNumber][0], RANDOM_ITEMS[randomNumber][1]);

btw your source is terrible and i recommend you changing it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@bunny_lover wrote:

Ok, so mainly my problem is this: I edited the contents of the mystery box in HandeContentItems.java using the code, (bare with me i cant copy and paste from my vps to here so ima try my best to type it out, ima very unexperienced coder trying to work alone with no help unfortunately ) ok heres the code i used:

case1:
c.getItems().addItem(####, #);
break’

and also the code:

case 1:
c.getitems().addItem(#### + Misc.random(#), #);
break;

Like i said, I started my server about a week ago, I had a developer lined out, but just hasnt been around or tried to do anything, so im left to do everything. Anyway when I edited these codes, and updated server, i now get very random items that i did not put in the boxes, and I have no idea what i did wrong/nor how to fix it. Please add me on skype or mesasge me on here, this is VERY URGENT, any help will be greatly appreciated.

Skype: jacob.Doyle58
